version_description:
- Added a menu under the settings button to write a review .
- Minor bug fix.

- Browse all iTunes songs, instead of just playlists.
- Added Searching.
- Minor usability improvement.

- Ringtone name can be changed in the app.
- Added a notice clarifying that DRM-protected songs will not show in the list.
- Minor bug fix.

- Stability improvements.
- Voiceover improvements.
- Minor bug fix.

- Added 'How To' menu under the Settings.
- Minor bug fix and improvement.

- Added in-app purchase to remove ads.
- Improved accessibility with changing start position and duration.

- Supports importing audio files from other apps through the share sheet.
- Minor improvement with voiceover.
- Minor bug fix.

- Fixed a crash while changing duration for the some devices with certain region setting.
- Minimum duration is now 1 second long.
- Fixed a crash when a song reaches the end of the duration.
- General improvements.

- Added an app setting to auto-advance the start position.
- Bug fix.
- General improvements.

- Added Start Increment and Duration Increment settings on the Settings page.
You can pick how from 1 second down to 0.1 second.

- Fixed crashes on some devices with Non-English locale.
- Minor bug fix.

- Fixed a bug where the music exported to GarageBand has a sound quality loss and is not in stereo. 
You will have to remake the ringtones again with this update! ;)
- Minor bug fix with copying to MusicToRingtone from other apps.
- Fixed a bug (introduced in the last update) with creating ringtones from iTunes synched songs.

- Added support for importing mp4 file.
- Minor bug fix.

- Fixed a bug where the app continues to crash on start up for few people.
- Minor bug fix with auto-advance feature.
- Minor bug fixes and UI update.
Bug fixes and general improvements.

- Now you can save the entire audio from any videos in m4a format.
1. Tap on Load to pick a video from the photo album or Files app.
2. Tap on Save and choose "Share the entire audio (.m4a) file".

- Fade in and fade out effect.
Tab on the 'Settings' icon and turn on 'Fade In Duration' and 
'Fade Out Duration' switches and choose duration.

- Export and share music from your iTunes library.
Load your music, tab on 'Save' and 'Share the entire audio (.m4a) file'.

- Minor bug fix and maintenance.

***Please leave a review if you enjoyed app. It helps out a lot! :)

- Minor bug fix and UI improvement.

* Feel free to reach out for help or feedback.
**Please leave a review if you enjoyed app. It helps out a lot! :)

- Minor bug fix.

* Visit www.musictoringtoneios.com for tips and how-to's
**Please leave a review if you enjoyed app. It helps out a lot! :)
- Fixed a bug where exporting certain type of files such as TikTok videos to GarageBand caused the app to crash.

- Regular maintenance to keep things running smoothly.

Don't hesitate to provide a feedback through the Settings menu.

- Regular maintenance to keep things running smoothly.

Don't hesitate to provide a feedback through the Settings menu.
*Please follow us on https://www.instagram.com/music.to.ringtone and visit https://www.musictoringtoneios.com for tips.
